milestones.name: Admin & Security Staff Training
milestones.description: Provide specialized training for network/security administrators on AppGate SDP usage and zero trust policies.
milestones.outcome: Administrators are proficient in managing AppGate SDP and understand zero trust principles.

milestones.name: Enable Device Posture Checks
milestones.description: Roll out the device security posture checking capability for all user devices and enforce compliance in access decisions.
milestones.outcome: Increased device compliance; unmanaged or insecure devices are restricted, reducing risk of breach via compromised endpoints.

milestones.name: Threat Intelligence Feed Integration
milestones.description: Connect AppGate SDP to external threat intelligence feeds and SIEM to dynamically update access policies based on emerging threats.
milestones.outcome: Proactive defense in place; known malicious IPs or threat indicators are automatically blocked via SDP policies.

milestones.name: Tabletop Security Drill
milestones.description: Conduct a tabletop exercise (simulated breach scenario) to test AppGate SDP effectiveness and incident response procedures.
milestones.outcome: Identified policy gaps and improvements in incident response; team is better prepared for real attack scenarios.

milestones.name: Configuration Audit & Policy Tuning
milestones.description: Perform a thorough configuration audit and policy review post-exercise to harden AppGate SDP settings and address any gaps found.
milestones.outcome: Security policies refined and tightened based on findings; residual risk is further reduced after adjustments.

milestones.name: Maturity Assessment & Next Steps
milestones.description: Assess cybersecurity maturity improvement after one year of AppGate SDP deployment; plan next-phase improvements if needed.
milestones.outcome: Maturity level increased to target; roadmap for continuous improvement (e.g., consider advanced analytics, expand zero trust to other areas) established.

conditional_recommendations.trigger: Excessive access violations or user policy denials in logs
conditional_recommendations.recommendation: Schedule additional user training and awareness on access policies
conditional_recommendations.rationale: Frequent policy denials might indicate users attempting unauthorized access or misunderstanding new controls.

conditional_recommendations.trigger: Emergence of a critical new threat/vulnerability relevant to network access
conditional_recommendations.recommendation: Initiate an out-of-cycle security review and apply necessary AppGate SDP policy updates or patches
conditional_recommendations.rationale: Addressing critical threats promptly ensures the network remains secure and leverages SDP capabilities to mitigate new risks.
